hive_news.title: Hive News
hive_news.description: <tournaments_site>World Hive Tournaments</tournaments_site> in person and online tournaments, tournament results, strategy articles. The place for the latest hive news.

tools.item1: <entomology_link>Entomology</entomology_link> Position editor and game explorer for games played on BGA or Boardspace
tools.item2: <explorer_link>Opening explorer</explorer_link> Opening search for tournament boardspace games
tools.item3: <hexketch_link>Hextech</hexketch_link> Hexketch is a website that allows you to easily generate images of hexagonal tiles on a hexagonal grid

tools.item1: <mzinga_link>Mzinga</mzinga_link> Mzinga is a collection of open-source software to play Hive, with the primary goal of building a community of developers who create Hive-playing AIs. Works on Windows Mac and Linux
tools.item2: <nokamute_link>Nokamute</nokamute_link> Nokamute is a open source hive AI, compatible with Mzinga.
tools.item3: <bga_downloader_link>BGA Game Downloader</bga_downloader_link> Download a Hive archived BGA game in sgf format.

links.item2: <reddit_link>Hive Subreddit</reddit_link> Share your strategies and experiences
links.item3: <facebook_link>World Hive Comunity Facebook</facebook_link> Connect with fellow players
links.item4: <instagram_link>Hive instagram</instagram_link> Pretty hive photos and memes

links.item1: <hive_champion_link>Play Hive Like a Champion</hive_champion_link>  Hive strategy book by Randy Ingersoll the 2011 World Champion.
links.item2: <hive_canon_link>Canon of Hive: Groundwork</hive_canon_link> First book part of a planned trilogy by multiple times hive world champion Joe Schultz
links.item3: <hive_puzzles_link>Hive Puzzles</hive_puzzles_link> Free collection of hive puzzles with solutions for beginners up to advanted

links.item1: <frasco_link>Frasco</frasco_link> Hive and other Abstract Strategy Games specialist
links.item2: <ringersol_link>Play Hive like a champion</ringersol_link> Youtube channel of Randy Ingersoll, tournament game reviews and strategy discussions
